job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Title: ML Engineer<br>Duration: 6 Months Contract with extensions.<br>Location: Remote<br> <br>PLEASE NOTE: As per the client requirement, we need to perform 5 years background check (Criminal, Education, employment check & DMV). Please confirm if you have no records in the background and you will be able to clear the background check.<br>Job Description:<br>•	At least two years' experience as a machine learning engineer.<br>•	Proficiency with Python, Java language<br>•	Extensive knowledge of ML frameworks, libraries and software architecture.<br>•	In-depth knowledge of mathematics, statistics, and algorithms.<br>Knowledge of CI,CD tools , Kubernetes is a plus
